meanings.definition: Cowered: to crouch down in fear
meanings.sent1: The small dog cowered behind the couch during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: She cowered in the corner of the room when she heard a loud noise.
meanings.sent3: The brave knight cowered playfully during the pretend dragon attack.
meanings.sent4: The flowers cowered under the weight of the heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The child cowered under the bedsheet tent, imagining monsters outside.
